    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Armor
    Represents an armor item that provides defense and dodge bonuses.
    ArmoredZombie
    A tough zombie that gains defense against sharp weapons and weak to HEAVY weapons.
    Attackable
    Interface for entities that can be attacked and take damage.
    Axe
    Represents an axe.
    BattleView
    Manages the UI and animations for the battle scene.
    BossZombie
    The powerful Boss Zombie with enrage mechanics.
    Character
    Base class representing any character in the game (Player or Zombie).
    CombatKnife
    Represents a combat knife weapon.
    GameController
    Controls the main game logic, flow, and interactions between models and views.
    Hammer
    Represents a heavy hammer weapon.
    InventoryView
    Manages the UI for the player's inventory.
    Item
    Abstract base class representing any item in the game.
    KevlarJacket
    Specific implementation of Armor: Kevlar Jacket.
    KnuckleDusters
    Represents knuckle-dusters.
    LeatherJacket
    Specific implementation of Armor: Leather Jacket.
    Machete
    Represents a machete weapon.
    Main
    Main application class responsible for starting the game.
    NormalZombie
    A standard zombie enemy with regeneration abilities.
    OrganDroppable
    Interface for entities that drop organ parts when defeated.
    OrganParts
    Represents the currency items (Hearts and Brains) collected in the game.
    Player
    Represents the main player character controlled by the user.
    Potion
    Represents a potion item used to restore health.
    Purchasable
    Interface for items that can be purchased in the shop.
    ResourceManager
    Manages the loading and caching of image resources.
    Revolver
    Represents a revolver handgun.
    Rifle
    Represents a high-powered rifle.
    RiotSuit
    Specific implementation of Armor: Riot Suit.
    RottenZombie
    A decaying zombie that inflicts poison on attack and weak to SHARP weapons.
    RunnerZombie
    A fast zombie that can increase its dodge chance and weak to GUN weapons.
    Shop
    Represents a shop where the player can purchase items.
    ShopView
    Manages the UI for the shop/merchant scene.
    ShotGun
    Represents a shotgun.
    SoundManager
    Manages the playback of sound effects and background music.
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon item that increases attack power and critical stats.
    WeaponType
    Enumeration representing different types of weapons.
    WoodenStick
    Represents a basic wooden stick weapon.
    Zombie
    Abstract base class for all Zombie enemies.
